All Implemented Interfaces:
Gui, Subwindow, Viewpoint, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GraphAreaPanel
extends ZoomScrollPanel

Implementation of GUI panel, that can show Graph locations.

Author:
ondra

VIRTUAL_ZOOM_TRESHOLD

public static final float VIRTUAL_ZOOM_TRESHOLD
Maximal minimum distance between locations to apply the virtual zoom. Virtual zoom makes distances smaller without affecting object bitmaps.

Method Detail

render

protected void render()
This method is meant to be overidden by subclasses in order to render the simulation state. This method is not threadsafe. It is called from paint method.

Specified by:
render in class AnimatedPanel

getObjectAtPosition

public IveObject getObjectAtPosition(java.awt.Point point,
                                     boolean acceptWP)
Description copied from class: ZoomScrollPanel
Retrieves object under the given point (ignoring transparency in GIFs)

Specified by:
getObjectAtPosition in class ZoomScrollPanel
Parameters:
point - Point to be searched.
acceptWP - do we accept also the WayPoints?
Returns:
IveObject (even a WayPoint, under the point)

updateViewpoint

public void updateViewpoint()
Description copied from class: ZoomScrollPanel
This method should be called between JPanel size and position changes and access to the viewpoint iface. This is here just to optimize the performance

Overrides:
updateViewpoint in class ZoomScrollPanel

initialize

public void initialize(GraphArea map)
Initialization of the view. This highly depends on the given map.

Parameters:
map - Area2DGrid map to be viewed.

isInitialized

public boolean isInitialized()
Are we initialized?

Returns:
TRUE iff this view was previously initialized with existing Area2DGrid location and this location did not cease to exist.

revalidateSubwindow

public boolean revalidateSubwindow()
Forces the Subwindow to revalidate its contents. This is called when major parts of current simulation were changed (e.g. after a load). This is supposed to be called with the Simulation (SchedulerImpl) lock locked.

Specified by:
revalidateSubwindow in interface Subwindow
Overrides:
revalidateSubwindow in class AnimatedPanel
Returns:
true iff the subwindow should be closed, since its contents are not valid any more.
